channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Inn Keeper/Tavern Keeper - Blue Dragon Offensive/Unseen Support
channel.description:
Btw if anyone has a better suggestion for the class names I'm open to it.
Trust me, Inn keeper is in fact offensive and not support
> # [color = "steblue"] Inn keeper [/color] > **[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Offensive [/color]** > > Night Ability 1: Counter offer - Anyone target player visits is immune to target players effects tonight. Can grant immunity to death, occupy, redirection and conversion. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Bribe - Anyone else visiting target player will be occupy, redirect and death immune tonight. Can target self (3 uses)
> # [color = "purple"] Tavern Keeper [/color] > **[color = "purple"] Unseen Support [/color]** > > Day Ability: Invigorating injection - The Assassin will bypass death immunity tonight (1 use) > > Night Ability 1: Fund - Target player will be death, occupy and redirect immune tonight (3 uses) > Night Ability 2: Sieze - If target player dies tonight and has at least 3 remaining uses of limited use ability's then all Unseen members will gain a use of all limited use ability's besides 2 for 1 and bleed (1 uses)
Note: Sieze effects itself. Also none of these ability's have any feedback whatsoever

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Inn Keeper/Tavern Keeper - Blue Dragon Offensive/Unseen Support
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

What makes this different from occupation?

Doesn’t impact anyone that isn’t an occupier/redirector/killer/converter, doesn’t inform the target, can be bypassed by death immunity bypass, can’t be bypassed by occupy immunity and it can block more than one of the same effect on the same person. So if the Assassin and NK attack the same person then Counter offer on the Assassin will block the NK’s attack as well.

RHCube:

Why did you put else?

Because you don’t do the effect on yourself

RHCube:

Isn’t this just a weaker protection?

Side graded. For one it stops occupy/redirect, it doesn’t block positive effects such as heal, it’s quieter, it can be used to prevent some confirmation methods for the Inn Keeper and it is paired with Sieze which can effectively give it more uses if needed

Read full topic
item.source: [Class Suggestion] Inn Keeper/Tavern Keeper - Blue Dragon Offensive/Unseen Support

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Inn Keeper/Tavern Keeper - Blue Dragon Offensive/Unseen Support
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 1: Counter offer - Anyone target player visits is immune to target players effects tonight. Can grant immunity to death, occupy, redirection and conversion. (Unlimited)

What makes this different from occupation?(Besides affecting investigatives, but that is not enough).

NuclearBurrito:

Anyone else

Why did you put else? That makes it confusing.

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 1: Fund - Target player will be death, occupy and redirect immune tonight (3 uses)

Isn’t this just a weaker protection? The only advantage it has is targeting non-unseen and working against non-visitors.

Everything else is good.

Read full topic
